name: Nodes
title: CS Lymph Nodes
notes:
**Note 1**:  Code only regional nodes and nodes, NOS , in this field.  Distant nodes are coded in CS Mets at DX.

**Note 2**:  Splenic lymph nodes and those located at the tail of the pancreas are not considered regional and should be coded in CS Mets at DX.
